amendment.description: At the end of the bill, add the following new title: TITLE IV--PRESIDENT'S BUDGET SUBMISSION SEC. 401. PREPARATION OF THE BUDGET.***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-388 to require the OMB Director to prepare all budgets submitted to the President according to both accrual-basis and cash-basis GAAP accounting standards.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Dold amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Dold.
